mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM sug_replace_cell_index a INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) id, gprs_id FROM sug_replace_cell_index WHERE gprs_id IN #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY gprs_id ) b ON a.id = b.id
